original_text: By a pillar of cloud you led them in the day, and by a pillar of fire in the night to light for them the way in which they should go.
korean_text: 낮에는 구름 기둥으로 인도하시고 밤에는 불 기둥으로 그들이 행할 길을 그들에게 비추셨사오며

sentences.original_text: By a pillar of cloud you led them in the day
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 낮에는 구름 기둥으로 그들을 인도하셨고

sentences.original_text: and by a pillar of fire in the night
to light for them the way
